citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:50 a.m. on
06-NOV-18.
According to an individual at the facility no one would be available to walk the inspector through the inspection
process for the day.
